title: How much is the EuroMillions jackpot tonight and who won on Tuesday?
text:
Tonight’s draw will take place at approximately 8pm (Picture: Katherine Balmer/REX)

It’s Friday night which means two things: 48 hours of freedom, and the chance to become a millionaire overnight!

We’re talking about the EuroMillions, of course.

Following this week’s record-breaking EuroMillions win, it seems like a prime time to chance your luck and enter the draw.

But what is tonight’s jackpot and has anyone claimed this week’s record-breaking win? Find out all you need to know here.

How much is the EuroMillions jackpot tonight?

Tonight’s jackpot is £15 million.

While huge, it somehow seems paltry when compared to Tuesday night’s winnings.

To be in with a chance to win, get your ticket before 7.30pm tonight before the results are drawn at approximately 8pm.

Previous winners Adrian and Gillian Bayford (Picture: Getty)

You can watch the results on YouTube, and if you subscribe to the National Lottery channel, you’ll be notified when the draws are ready to watch.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Who won the £170million prize on Tuesday?

Earlier this week, a UK ticket-holder scooped £170 million, becoming the country’s biggest ever EuroMillions winner, but they only claimed their prize yesterday.

They have refrained from revealing their identity so little else is known about them.

The lucky winners will be richer than Ed Sheeran (Picture: Luigi Rizzo/Pacific Press/LightRocket via Getty Images)

The win will make them richer than Ed Sheeran (worth an estimated £160 million) and Adele, who is worth around £150 million.

The previous record-holders for the biggest ever lottery win are Colin and Chris Weir, from Largs in North Ayrshire, Scotland – who won £161m in 2011.

Other big winners include Adrian and Gillian Bayford from Suffolk who scooped more than £148m in 2012.

MORE: Someone has claimed £170,000,000 EuroMillions jackpot

MORE: Who won the Euromillions jackpot, what were the results and what could you buy?
description: Feeling lucky? Find out what the stakes are for tonight's EuroMillions draw.
